children.text: Open-source has revolutionized software development -- it wouldn't be an overstatement to say that it's been the most significant productivity win for developers in the last decade or so. At Repl.it, our goal is to make programming more accessible and what better way to do that than make available to programmers the entirety of open-source packages available at their fingertips.

Today we're excited to announce our Universal Package Manager -- the Repl.it package manager that will grow to support every language on our platform. We're now starting with JavaScript, Python, HTML/CSS/JS, and the web frameworks that we support.

Furthermore, where we used to write custom code for every language that we support, now we merely add fields to a config file.
